location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: The map was prepared by the Bahrain Petroleum Company [BAPCO], and is referred to in a letter dated 21 November 1933 from the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf to the India Office (folio 279), and a letter dated 1 December 1933, from the India Office to the Admiralty (folios 274-276).The map shows line of submarine pipeline off Sitrah Island, Bahrain, with soundings in feet.Scale: 480mm = 1,000 feet.
